experiences.description: Built and operated Python-based backend APIs and automation pipelines for distributed network systems.
highlights: Developed RESTful APIs with OpenAPI, ensuring reliable integration across distributed systems
Reduced manual configuration time by ~40% through automation pipelines
Maintained 90%+ test coverage using TDD with Pytest
Created proof-of-concept tools adopted across engineering teams

experiences.description: Delivered production-ready full-stack web applications within Agile sprints.
highlights: Led a small project team using GitHub for version control and code reviews
Built React interfaces consuming REST APIs with responsive layouts
Implemented unit tests with Jest ensuring code stability

experiences.description: Graduated with honours. Dissertation project: Gurkha One mobile application.
highlights: Built end-to-end mobile app with React Native, Express, and TypeScript
Designed relational data models with TypeORM and MySQL
Implemented REST APIs with JWT authentication
